name: sqltools
description: Database management done right. Connection explorer, query runner, intellisense, bookmarks, query history. Feel like a database hero!

scripts.prewatch: yarn run clean && mkdir -p ../dist && cp -R node_modules ../dist/. && rm -rf ../dist/node_modules/@sqltools
scripts.package:preview: yarn run compile:preview && (cd ../dist && npm i && vsce package)
scripts.package: yarn run compile && (cd ../dist && npm i && vsce package)
